name: Kids Shave Doctor Salon Sports Game (Boy & Girl)
name_original: Kids Shave Doctor Salon Sports Game (Boy & Girl)
description:
Can you help your friends out before the big Sports game?

Play the best Kids Shave & Doctor Salon game in the app store today!! 8+ salon games wrapped up into a single game with a fun Sports theme!

Many Levels & Game Modes:
- It's time to shave that basketball beard! Go to the barber!
- Can you shave the baseball player's head?
- Ouch! The hockey player needs to get a waxing!
- Much more salon makeover fun!! Enjoy

Enjoy Kids Shave Doctor Salon Sports Game (Boy & Girl)! Best of all this doctor salon game is free! Enjoy!
